title: OPL Split 2 Week 2 and 4 results!
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/opl_split_1_announce.jpg?itok=aX-Y1qp7

Hey guys,

With week 4 over we have the results for the rematch in week 2 and also all of week 4's results, did all the games go has you have predicted?

**Week 2 winners!** - congrats! out of 81 entries the below 16 got all 8 right.
Essy
Repeater
CaptainWinner
Dinofungus
Lord Sushi
Skaithak
Chief EGym
OCG Karzyman
mad696969
pathenol
Asera
RikiRaccoon
IIxLynx
Kijari
HellenicX
Jason

Week 4 had 186 entries! unfortunately Av were the upset kings last week their loss to Absolute and win against Dire Wolves in week 4 knocked out MOST of the entries. No one guessed all 8 correct, better luck [next time](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/BW3lKOXL-opl-split-2-week-5-tipping)!
